title.value: Default values for Med Device CAT 3 documents.

repeating.value: $dqlvalue("select locale_value from d2_dictionary_value where alias_value in (select distinct g.group_name FROM dm_user u, dm_group g WHERE ANY g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and r_is_group = 0 and u.user_name =USER and g.group_name like '%_users') and any locale_value is not nullstring order by locale_value ENABLE(ROW_BASED)")

$dqlvalue("select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where object_name in (select locale_value from d2_dictionary_value where alias_value in (select distinct g.group_name FROM dm_user u, dm_group g WHERE ANY g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and r_is_group = 0 and u.user_name =USER and g.group_name like '%_users') and any locale_value is not nullstring) and alias_value like '%coordinators' and any alias_value is not nullstring order by alias_value ENABLE(ROW_BASED)")
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
